sources.title: Video CC translator - Chrome Web Store
sources.snippet: Translate Udemy, YouTube, and Udacity video lectures into your preferred language! This extension automatically translates subtitles (Closed Captions, CC) in real-time using Google Translate and DeepL.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 2. Video CC Translator (Chrome) Simple, reliable subtitle translator using Google Translate/DeepL. Works across YouTube and other video sites. Lets you customize subtitle style and positioning. Chrome Web Store

sources.title: AI Video Translator with Real-Time Bilingual Subtitles | Immersive ...
sources.snippet: The web version of Immersive Translate supports video translation via pasted YouTube links and X post links. The extension version enables real-time bilingual subtitles and subtitle-free translation across 60+ global online video platforms.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 3. Immersive Translate (Chrome/extension + link tool) AI-powered real-time bilingual lyrics/subtitles. Can generate translated subtitles even if none exist. Immersive Translate

sources.title: TransParrot: YouTube Translate & Dual Subtitles - Chrome Web Store
sources.snippet: Translate YouTube videos with AI-powered subtitles. dual/bilingual subtitles and natural text-to-speech. sources.title: 4 Best YouTube Subtitle Translator Chrome Extensions
sources.snippet: Quick Tips By default, YouTube lets you translate the captions present in a video. Click on the Captions icon > Subtitles > Auto Translate and select the language. For more translation features ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Notes These extensions only work well if there are captions to translate; autogenerated YouTube captions are often imperfect, so translation quality may vary. guidingtech.com
